item.title: My Personal Setup for the Terminal
item.description: Hello everyone! It’s been a busy few weeks, I’m studying a lot about Machine Learning and I don’t have too much time to write or share my progress. However, I had to set up a new development environment and I thought, why not share a bit of my setup? So here’s how to set up my favorite prompt and font! The Starship Prompt The first tool I want to introduce is the Starship prompt.
